# predict.pics — Pictures & Photography Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for pictures & photography. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.pics is a prediction market platform focused on pictures & photography. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Pictures & Photography prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.pics)
- [Markets — Active pictures & photography prediction markets](https://predict.pics#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, pictures & photography, betting, odds, forecast, predict.pics
